ratings.note: Moody's DOWNGRADED to B2 from B1 (Dec 2025). S&P outlook Negative (Nov 2025). Deteriorating credit profile.

overview.business_description: Holding company for major UK-based chemicals conglomerate involved in intermediate and specialty chemicals manufacturing. One of the world's largest privately-owned chemicals groups. Owned by billionaire Jim Ratcliffe. Operations include petrochemicals, specialty chemicals, and oil & gas.
business_positives: Large scale - one of world's biggest chemicals groups
Project ONE investments for future growth
overview.fatal_flaw: SEVERELY DISTRESSED - Distress score 44. ALL bonds trading DEEPLY BELOW PAR (79-86) with yields of 15-21%. Net leverage EXPLODED from 2.3x to 9.0x in 3 years. EBITDA collapsed -49% from $2.8bn to $1.4bn. Debt increased from $9.4bn to $16.1bn. Net income -$798m (loss). Downgraded by Moody's to B2. S&P Negative outlook. 2027 maturity wall concerns.
overview.ownership: Private - owned by Jim Ratcliffe (UK billionaire). No PE sponsor - family/founder controlled.
overview.recent_news: Downgraded to B2 from B1 by Moody's (Dec 2025). S&P outlook Negative on weak earnings, high leverage (Nov 2025). INEOS Quattro concerns over 2027 maturity wall (Nov 2025). Entering cyclically weaker period as Project ONE investments continue (Dec 2025). Bonds and loans dropped following downgrades (Dec 2025).

key_ratios.note: CRITICAL: Leverage EXPLODED from 2.3x (2022) to 9.0x (LTM). EBITDA collapsed. Unsustainable capital structure.

trend_analysis.trend_summary: DETERIORATING RAPIDLY: EBITDA -49% from peak. Debt +72%. Leverage 2.3xâ†’9.0x. Net income now NEGATIVE. Margins compressed from 12.7% to 8.1%.

maturity_schedule.maturity_wall: 2027-2029 maturities a concern given current leverage

credit_opinion.summary: INEOS Group is a SEVERELY DISTRESSED credit with distress score of 44 - second highest in portfolio after Very Group. ALL bonds trading DEEPLY BELOW PAR at 79-86 with yields of 15-21% signaling market expects restructuring or significant haircut. Net leverage has EXPLODED from 2.3x (2022) to 9.0x (LTM) as EBITDA collapsed -49% while debt increased +72%. Net income is negative ($798m loss). Moody's downgraded to B2 (Dec 2025) and S&P has Negative outlook. 2027 maturity wall raises concerns about refinancing ability at current leverage. While Jim Ratcliffe ownership provides potential support, the capital structure appears unsustainable without significant EBITDA recovery or restructuring.
key_risks: Project ONE investment drain on cash

distress_indicators.trading_signals: SEVERELY DISTRESSED: All bonds at 79-86 (deeply below par). Yields 15-21%. TLB at 79 with 21% yield. Rating downgraded. Outlook Negative. Leverage 9.0x unsustainable. Capital structure stress evident.
